nodes.text: Joel - Is that you?
Who else would it be? How many other dead people do you have on your formerly friends list?
Aaaaarrrrooooohhhhhh.
Not again!
You have heard the expression, Misery loves company? In my case, so does boredom.
Aaaaarrrrooooohhhhhh.
So why are you haunting me?
You could have saved me! You left me to die. Some friend you are.

options.text: Explain How Hard You Tried to Help Joel

nodes.text: Look, Joel, I really tried to help you, remember? You were the one who warned me to stay away from the Wraith. I did the best I could to save you.
I just wish you had tried a little harder...
It's not my fault that you were wandering in the catacombs and got hurt. You knew it was dangerous before you went down there.
Besides, you betrayed me with Sosi. You deserved what you got.
The worst thing that could have happened because of breaking into my dorm room is that you would have been kicked out of school. I do not think that is remotely the same thing as leaving me to die.
If I had tried to save you, I'd just have lost my life, too. Then we'd both be ghosts and how dull would that be? This way, at least you have someone to talk to about being dead.
It would have been better than just dying alone.
I tried to rescue you, but I just couldn't defeat the wraith. I'm sorry.
I'm really sorry that I wasn't able to save you. I just couldn't find you in time.
I kept hoping that someone would find me before I perished. Maybe I am not always the best person, but it would have been nice to know that someone cared about me.
So what's it like to be dead?
It is not very nice at all so far. Sure, I can walk through walls and go places I never could go before...
Like the women's bathroom?
Why would I do that? It's not like I care.
Death is like being stuck in a boring dream while knowing that you can never wake up.
So - are you going to haunt me for the rest of my life?
I don't know yet. It depends upon how bored I am.
Look, I'm sorry you're dead, but it really wasn't my fault. Why don't you go off and haunt Sosi? He probably deserves it.
I tried to haunt Caesari, but he didn't awaken.
Would you mind letting me go back to sleep then? Go back to your old room. Maybe Sosi will wake up if you rattle some chains or something near his ear.
I will see if I can scare Caesari awake. Haunting him will be much more satisfying than haunting you.
Thanks, I guess.
Whoa. Was that a crazy dream or what?
So what did happen to you? How did you die?

Caesari and I were exploring a new section of the catacombs to look for treasure when a Wraith appeared. We ran away from it when I tripped and broke my ankle. I begged Caesari to help but he just kept on running.
I tried to crawl out of the catacombs but I was lost in the maze. I could see the Wraith coming for me and I tried to hide from it. That's about all I remember.
If Sosi was the one who left you to die, why are you haunting me and not him?
<shrug> Caesari is a heavy sleeper and he wouldn't wake up.
So what's it like, being dead?
Boring, really boring. Everything looks dull and drab. This might explain why there aren't more ghosts floating around - they were bored to death. Assuming, of course, that ghosts can die.
I'm really sorry that you are dead. I'm going to miss you and your blackmarket store.
I will miss you, too, Shawn. If only you had found me in the catacombs before I died. I know that you would have saved me.
Thomas was very apologetic that he didn't find me sooner before I died. You two are the best friends I ever had. Thank you for being a friend.
Okay... I hope that Joel doesn't decide to haunt me for the rest of my life. That could get awkward.
I really hope that was a dream.
Maybe I shouldn't have eaten so much for supper. It's given me a queasy stomach and bad dreams.
